properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 1:04AM MST until February 8 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5
inches at lower elevations and 5 to 10 inches in the mountains.
Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Gallatin County.

* WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING
